title: Update contact details, business hours, and social links (frontend)

requirements.summary: Update centralized frontend contact configuration with the provided address, phones, email, WhatsApp, and business hours while preserving primary-phone CTA support.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` reflects the updated address, email, WhatsApp number/url, and includes both phone numbers (while still supporting a primary phone for single-phone CTAs).
All existing CTAs (HeaderNav, TopBar, FloatingWhatsAppButton, ContactSection, Footer) continue to render valid `tel:` and `https://wa.me/` links after the config update.

file_operations.description: Update CONTACT_INFO to match the provided business details exactly: address "Ricco Industrial Area Sujangarh Rajasthan:- 331507", phones "+91 7734920728" and "+91 7297963005" (including valid `tel:` values), email "ccsolutions0055@gmail.com", WhatsApp number "+91 7734920728" with wa.me link using 917734920728, and business hours "Mon - Sat: 08:00 AM - 06:00 PM". Keep an explicit primary phone for single-phone CTAs while also exposing a phones array for multi-phone UI.
Confirm WhatsApp URL composition continues to work with the updated CONTACT_INFO.whatsapp.url and still generates valid message links.

requirements.summary: Update TopBar, Contact section, and Footer to show both phone numbers and business hours with consistent English labels and formatting.
acceptanceCriteria: ContactSection shows both phone numbers as clickable phone links and shows business hours text (e.g., "Mon - Sat: 08:00 AM - 06:00 PM").
Footer contact area includes business hours and both phone numbers (each clickable).
TopBar continues to show at least the primary phone and WhatsApp; if space allows, it additionally exposes the second phone and/or hours without breaking mobile layout.

file_operations.description: Implement a small reusable PhoneNumberLinks component that renders both configured phone numbers as clickable `tel:` links with consistent formatting for use in contact-related areas.

Update TopBar to keep showing primary phone and WhatsApp, and (responsive/space-permitting) additionally show the secondary phone and/or business hours without breaking the mobile layout, using CONTACT_INFO as the source of truth.
Replace the single-phone rendering with both phone numbers as clickable `tel:` links (reusing PhoneNumberLinks) and add a business hours row displaying CONTACT_INFO.hours with an English label.
Update the Footer contact area to render both phone numbers (each clickable) and include a business hours line sourced from CONTACT_INFO.hours, keeping formatting consistent with ContactSection.

requirements.summary: Ensure Facebook/Instagram/YouTube links use the provided URLs and are visible in the UI with accessible aria-labels and safe new-tab behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The active social links include Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube with the exact provided URLs.
Users can click the social links from the UI (open in a new tab with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`).
Each rendered social link has an appropriate accessible label (e.g., "Visit our Facebook page").

file_operations.description: Verify the socialLinks configuration contains the exact provided Facebook/Instagram/YouTube URLs and appropriate ariaLabel strings; keep any non-provided networks disabled/empty so only valid links render.

Render active social links (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube) somewhere appropriate in the Footer using getActiveSocialLinks(), ensuring each link opens in a new tab with `rel="noopener noreferrer"` and includes the configured accessible aria-label.
